CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Audio response strength (X: bass level, Y: bass hits)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Audio response curve (higher = more intense reaction)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_pow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Flash brightness (X: off-beat intensity, Y: on-beat intensity)
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Distance of flash sphere from camera along the path
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_dist

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Flash sphere radius (X: off-beat size, Y: on-beat size)
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_radius

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Frame blending amount (0 = sharp, 1 = heavy trails)
CONTROLS.NAME: motion_blur

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Animation speed (X: time-based, Y: bass time-based)
CONTROLS.NAME: time_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Path wave amplitude (X and Y control horizontal/vertical swing)
CONTROLS.NAME: path_b

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Path wave frequency (X and Y control sine wave oscillation)
CONTROLS.NAME: path_a

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: RGB color of flash during off-beat moments
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_col_min

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Hue base for fractal beam glow (X: primary hue, Y: variation)
CONTROLS.NAME: beam_hue

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: RGB color of flash during on-beat moments
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_col_max

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Brightness multiplier for fractal beam glow
CONTROLS.NAME: beam_lum

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media multiplier – boost opacity for bold color effects
CONTROLS.NAME: media_mult

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media opacity – fade visuals in or out
CONTROLS.NAME: media_alpha

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media texture offset position (X: horizontal, Y: vertical)
CONTROLS.NAME: media_off

DESCRIPTION: Plunge into the Dark Twister—a mesmerizing journey through a spiraling vortex of neon light and shadow. Recursive fractal geometry twists and folds through infinite space, creating a tunnel of electric blue and vibrant magenta beams that pulse and flash with the music. A glowing sphere of energy leads the way, casting dramatic reflections across the sleek, dark surfaces. The entire structure warps along a sinuous path while audio-reactive elements make every bass hit intensify the flash and twist the geometry deeper. Perfect for dark techno, bass music, and atmospheric sets where mysterious beauty meets raw energy.
TITLE: Dark twister
